trans-unit.source: How to: Create a New Variable (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 如何︰ 建立新的變數 (Visual Basic) |Microsoft 文件

trans-unit.source: How to: Create a New Variable (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 如何：建立新的變數 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: You create a variable with a [Dim Statement](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/dim-statement.md).
trans-unit.target: 您建立的變數[Dim 陳述式](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/dim-statement.md)。

trans-unit.source: To create a new variable
trans-unit.target: 若要建立新變數

trans-unit.source: Declare the variable in a `Dim` statement.
trans-unit.target: 中宣告變數`Dim`陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Include specifications for the variable's characteristics, such as [Private](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/private.md), [Static](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/static.md), [Shadows](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/shadows.md), or [WithEvents](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/withevents.md).
trans-unit.target: 包含變數的特性的規格，例如[私用](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/private.md)，[靜態](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/static.md)，[陰影](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/shadows.md)，或[WithEvents](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/withevents.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Declared Element Characteristics](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/declared-element-characteristics.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[宣告項目特性](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/declared-element-characteristics.md)。

trans-unit.source: You do not need the `Dim` keyword if you use other keywords in the declaration.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要`Dim`關鍵字宣告中使用其他關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: Follow the specifications with the variable's name, which must follow [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] rules and conventions.
trans-unit.target: 規格之後加上變數名稱，必須遵循[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]規則和慣例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Declared Element Names](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/declared-element-names.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[宣告項目名稱](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/declared-element-names.md)。

trans-unit.source: Follow the name with the [As](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/as-clause.md) clause to specify the variable's data type.
trans-unit.target: 在名稱後面加[為](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/as-clause.md)子句來指定變數的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the data type, it uses the default: `Object`.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定資料型別，它會使用預設值︰ `Object`。

trans-unit.source: Follow the `As` clause with an equal sign (`=`) and follow the equal sign with the variable's initial value.
trans-unit.target: 請依照下列`As`子句以等號 (`=`) 和變數的初始值為等號後面。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] assigns the specified value to the variable every time it runs the `Dim` statement.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]將指定的值指派給變數，每次執行`Dim`陳述式。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify an initial value, [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] assigns the default initial value for the variable's data type when it first enters the code that contains the `Dim` statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定一個初始值，[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]會先進入包含的程式碼時，變數的資料型別預設初始值`Dim`陳述式。

trans-unit.source: If the variable is a reference type, you can create an instance of its class by including the [New Operator](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/operators/new-operator.md) keyword in the `As` clause.
trans-unit.target: 如果變數是參考型別，您可以建立其類別的執行個體包括[New 運算子](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/operators/new-operator.md)關鍵字`As`子句。

trans-unit.source: If you do not use `New`, the initial value of the variable is [Nothing](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/nothing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如果您不使用`New`，變數的初始值會是[Nothing](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/nothing.md)。
